charges.charge_description: WILLFUL FAILURE TO COLLECT/PAY OVER TAX(17)

charges.charge_disposition: The defendant pleaded guilty to Count 17 on November 23, 2005 of the Indictment. IMPRISONMENT TERM: The defendant is hereby comm itted to the custody of the United States Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for a total term of 12 Months and One (1) day on Count 17. The Court recommends to the Bureau of Prisons: The Court recommends that the defendant be placed at the Federal Camp, Leavenworth, Kansas. The defendant shall surrender for service of sentence at the institution designated by the Bureau of Prisons before 12:00 P.M. on September 12, 2006 as notified by the United States Marshal. SUPERVISED RELEASE: Upon release from imprisonm ent, the defendant shall be on supervised release for a term 3 years. STANDARD CONDITIONS. $100.00 MSA due immediately. No fine. No restitution. Defendant advised of right to appeal
